summary: This is an email chain from January 2022 between FBI Special Agents discussing a proposed InfraGard webinar presentation by the Boston chapter about the efforts to locate and capture Ghislaine Maxwell. The New York coordinator seeks to deconflict with the Case Manager in New York and clarifies the presentation would only cover the location and arrest, not the investigation or trial material.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The proposed InfraGard webinar is about the efforts to locate and capture her. She is the central figure the presentation would discuss.

events.title: Proposed Boston InfraGard Webinar on Maxwell Capture
events.description: The Boston InfraGard chapter proposed hosting a webinar detailing the steps taken to locate and arrest Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: In January 2022, the FBI's Boston InfraGard chapter proposed a webinar on the efforts to locate and capture Ghislaine Maxwell.
The proposed presentation was specifically limited to the steps for location and arrest, excluding material from the investigation or trial.
The New York FBI InfraGard coordinator was involved to deconflict the presentation with the New York Case Manager.
